attributes.name: Mattemoiselle Plush Matte Lipstick
attributes.heading: 1.7g
attributes.description:
What it is:

An ultra slim lipstick with a longwearing, petal-soft matte finish.

What it does:

Rep every mood in full-on colour. High-intensity pigment meets 14 unexpectedly universal shades to complement all moods, all skin tones, all day. Whether you’re looking for the perfect red, everyday nude, or moody blue, Mattemoiselle Plush Matte Lipstick makes it easier than ever to rock the entire rainbow. Rihanna wanted to make the matte lipstick of your dreams a reality: Think mega rich color in a weightless formula. The ultimate light-as-air texture glides on creamy and stays put—no bleeding or feathering after application—with a velvety, soft matte inspired by a rose petal finish. And thanks to Mattemoiselle’s chic, slim design, you can effortlessly define lips with the ultimate control, for a fuller look with every stroke.

What else you need to know:

Fenty Beauty is 100% cruelty free.
attributes.how-to-text: Swipe on and go. For a fuller lip look, add a second layer.
attributes.ingredients: Ma'Damn: Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Mica, Isohexadecane, Isononyl Isononanoate, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone/Bis-Isobutyl Ppg-20 Crosspolymer, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Aqua/Water/Eau, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polyethylene Terephthalate, Acrylates Copolymer, Tin Oxide, Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891). All Other Shades: Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire De Candelilla, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Isohexadecane, Isononyl Isononanoate, Mica, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone/Bis-Isobutyl Ppg-20 Crosspolymer, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera Cera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire De Carnauba, Aqua/Water/Eau, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caprylyl Glycol, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polyethylene Terephthalate, Acrylates Copolymer, Tin Oxide. attributes.name: Facial Spray With Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater
attributes.heading: 118ml
attributes.description:
What it is:

Facial Spray With Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater refreshes the skin with a unique blend of herbal extracts and rosewater.

What it does:

Mist it over makeup, or on its own any time of the day to perk yourself up. This facial spray serves as perfect hydration for tight, uncomfortable skin types. Its fine mist also sets makeup and keeps hair from drying out. Thanks to this gentle creation by Mario Badescu, you can now feel energised from head to toe.This product hydrates skin and hair any time of the day.

What else you need to know:

  • Prevents skin allergy
  • Ideal for use in dry environments
  • Safe for all skin types
attributes.how-to-text:
• Hold the facial spray about five or six inches away from your face or hair and spritz.
  • Let it sit on your face for a minute, then blot the excess with a tissue. 
  • To use the facial spray as a setting powder, dab gently over your makeup.
  • Spray on at any time of the day to boost hydration.
attributes.application:
* Hold the facial spray about five or six inches away from your face or hair and spritz.
* Let it sit on your face for a minute, then blot the excess with a tissue. 
* To use the facial spray as a setting powder, dab gently over your makeup.
* Spray on at any time of the day to boost hydration.
attributes.ingredients: Deionized Water (Aqua), Aloe (Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice) Vera Gel, Bladderwrack (Fucus Vesiculous) Extract, Herbal Extract, Rose (Rosa Gallica) Extract, Gardenia (Gardenis Florida) Extract, Propylene Glycol

seo.meta-description: Buy Facial Spray With Aloe, Herbs and Rosewater from Mario Badescu here. Refresh and hydrate your skin with a unique blend of herbal extracts and rosewater.

attributes.name: Mist & Fix Setting Spray
attributes.description:
What it is:

A lightweight, non-sticky secret weapon for longer lasting makeup, Mist & Fix creates a sweat-proof, rub-resistant barrier for fresh-looking makeup that lasts up to 12 hours.

What it does:

It increases hydration for a silky, smooth appearance and won't dry skin out. This product is formulated with a complex to boost oxygenation and deliver a healthy-looking, radiant glow.

What else you need to know:

  • For all skin types
  • Dermatologist-tested
  • Alcohol-free
attributes.how-to-text:
• After makeup application, hold Mist & Fix an arm's length away from face and spray.
  • Allow time to dry.

attributes.name: Bath Flower
attributes.description:
What it is:

Scrub all the impurities away with this loofah sponge.

What it does:

It also helps to remove dead skin cells for a renewed appearance. After your bath, you’ll achieve supple, delicate and smooth skin. A dab of shower cream is all you need to create an excellent amount of lather for superior comfort.

What else you need to know:

  • Comfortable texture
  • Allows user to hang the loofah in the shower after use
  • Unique design adds a touch of colour to the bathroom
attributes.how-to-text:
• Wet the sponge in hot water and squeeze it to soften the material.
  • Apply a small amount of liquid soap onto the sponge.
  • Gently rub all over your body in circular motions, focusing on dry areas.
  • Rinse completely and leave the sponge to dry.
attributes.application:
* Wet the sponge in hot water and squeeze it to soften the material. 
* Apply a small amount of liquid soap onto the sponge. 
* Gently rub all over your body in circular motions, focusing on dry areas. 
* Rinse completely and leave the sponge to dry.

seo.page-title: Buy Sephora Collection Bath Flower Loofah Sponge

attributes.name: Glow Tonic
attributes.description:
What it is:

A gently exfoliating toner for more even, brighter and clearer skin.

What it does:

Cult-favorite Glow Tonic by Pixi removes dead skin cells to reveal healthy glowing skin and a refined texture that looks and feels smooth. The hypoallergenic formula is made with botanical extracts, including aloe vera and ginseng, to soothe sensitive skin. Ideal for all skin types.
attributes.how-to-text:
• Saturate a cotton pad with the tonic and sweep across face, neck and décolletage (avoiding eye area).
  • Use morning and night after cleansing.
attributes.application: Exfoliating facial glow tonic. It helps tone, firm and tighten the skin. It removes dead skin cells for healthier looking skin. For all skin types. Alcohol free.  Key ingredients: aloe vera, ginseng and glycolic acid-5%. Suitable for all skin types.  Directions for use: Saturate a cotton pad with the tonic and sweep across face, neck and décolletage (avoiding eye area). Can be used AM and PM after cleansing.
attributes.ingredients: Aqua, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Seed Extract, Glycolic Acid, Ammonium Glycolate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Hexylene Glycol (and) Fructose (and) Glucose (and) Sucrose (and) Urea (and) Dextrin (and) Alanine (and) Glutamic Acid (and) Aspartic Acid (and) Hexyl Nicotinate, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Biotin, Polysorbate 20, Fragrance

seo.meta-description: Buy Glow Tonic from Pixi here. Discover the gently exfoliating toner that removes dead skin cells to reveal smooth and healthy glowing skin.

attributes.name: Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer
attributes.heading: 9ml - Fenty Glow
attributes.description:
What it is:

The ultimate gotta-have-it lip gloss with explosive shine in one universal rose nude shade.

What it does:

The stop-everything, give-it-to-me, gloss that feels as good as it looks: Gloss Bomb delivers explosive shine in one perfect rose nude shade handpicked by Rihanna herself, Fenty Glow. One luscious swipe of Gloss Bomb’s XXL wand gives lips more to love, while conditioning shea butter enriches from within. Lips look instantly fuller and smoother, with a non-sticky formula that’s super shiny and has an addictive peach-vanilla scent you just can’t get enough of.

What else you need to know:

  • Fenty Beauty is 100% cruelty-free.
attributes.how-to-text: Wear it alone or layer over lipstick as the finishing touch to the Fenty Face.
attributes.ingredients: Polybutene, Octyldodecanol, Bis-diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Tricaprylin, Cera Microcristallina/microcrystalline Wax/cire Microcristalline, Polyethylene, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Vp/eicosene Copolymer, Vp/hexadecene Copolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Mica, Sorbitan Oleate, Silica, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Caprylyl Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Unsaponifiables, Aroma/flavor, Parfum/fragrance, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Lactic Acid, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Polyethylene Terephthalate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Acrylates Copolymer, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene

seo.meta-description: Buy Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer from Fenty Beauty here. Discover the ultimate lip gloss with explosive shine in one universal rose nude shade.

attributes.name: Overnight Glow Serum
attributes.heading: 30ml
attributes.description:
What it is:

A serum that works while you sleep to exfoliate and soothe skin for brighter complexion in the morning.

What it does:

Sleep off fatigued and stressed skin with the Overnight Glow Serum by Pixi. The potent serum helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and fade sun spots over time with a nutrient-rich formula including calming cucumber and aloe vera extracts, as well as nourishing vitamins A, C and E.
attributes.how-to-text:
• Use at night.
  • Massage 2 or 3 drops onto clean, toned skin before applying moisturiser.
  • We recommend using SPF in the daytime, especially when using a product with glycolic acid.
attributes.application: Exfoliate & soothe skin with this miracle serum that works while you sleep to reveal a brighter complexion. Formulated with 10% glycolic acid & arginine, it helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and fade sun spots over time. Enriched with cucumber & aloe vera extracts to calm skin and vitamins A, C & E to nourish. Use PM.  Massage 2 to 3 drops onto cleansed, toned skin before moisturizer.  We recommend using SPF in the daytime,especially when using a product with glycolic acid.
attributes.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Ammonium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Arginine, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Lecithin, Sucrose, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cyclopentasiloxane, BHT, Cyclohexasiloxane, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbic Acid

attributes.name: Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Primer
attributes.heading: 32ml - Soft Matte
attributes.description:
What it is:

A shine-stopping, pore-diffusing primer that smooths the way for better foundation application and longer wear.

What it does:

Nothing is sexier than touch-worthy skin, and Pro Filt’r Instant Retouch Primer is the first step to getting there. Paired with Pro Filt'r Foundation, this oil-free primer smooths away the look of pores, visibly evens skin tone and texture, and instantly absorbs shine without feeling dry or chalky. That means smoother foundation application and longer makeup wear. The cushiony texture mattifies skin with the lightest-possible feel, and the universal invisipink formula creates a filter-like blurring effect, melting instantly into all skin tones without a trace. Pro Filt’r works all day to help makeup last longer, feeling lightweight and comfortable.

What else you need to know:

  • Fenty Beauty is 100% cruelty-free.
attributes.how-to-text:
One pump is all it takes for an instant retouch effect. Start at the center of your face and blend outward. For the ultimate Fenty Face follow with Pro Filt’r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation.

Artistry Pro Tip: If you have dry skin, apply primer to just the areas of your face that tend to get oily (think T-zone and around the mouth).
attributes.ingredients: Aqua/water/eau, Dimethicone, Isododecane, Glycerin, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Nylon-12, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone/vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Talc, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Benzoic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Hydrogen Dimethicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum/fragrance, Aluminum Hydroxide, Coral Powder, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492)

seo.meta-description: Buy Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Primer from Fenty Beauty here. Discover the shine-stopping, pore-diffusing primer for better foundation application.

attributes.name: Tattoo Liner
attributes.description:
What it is:

A liquid eyeliner with an innovative brush tip for effortless, precise application.

What it does:

Achieve eye perfection with this high-pigment, waterproof liner that stays put all day for a fade-, melt-, crack-, and run-resistant finish. The superfine and flexible brush tip glides across the lashline for incredibly fluid application, allowing you to create a variety of looks with ease. Unlike traditional felt tip liners, this brush tip will not fray.

What else you need to know:

The Trooper shade is an Allure Reader's Choice award winner.

This product is vegan and completely free of animal-derived ingredients.
attributes.how-to-text:
• For a subtle defining line, lightly drag the brush tip across the base of your lash line from the inner to the outer corner. Press as close to the roots as possible.
  • Use less pressure to create a thinner line, more pressure for bolder. Continue to layer until desired definition is achieved.
  • For best results, wipe brush tip with a damp tissue before applying to prevent build-up or drying out the eyeliner.

seo.meta-description: Buy Tattoo Liner from Kat Von D here. Achieve eye perfection with this high-pigment, waterproof eyeliner that glides smoothly across your lashline.

attributes.name: Stunna Lip Paint Longwear Fluid Lip Color
attributes.heading: 4ml - Uncensored
attributes.description:
What it is:

A weightless, 12-hour liquid lipstick in a high-impact colour with a soft matte finish.

What it does:

Stunna Lip Paint combines high-impact colour with low-maintenance long-lasting wear in one head-turning shade of matte red, handpicked by Rihanna, that looks incredible on all skin tones. Equal parts class and sass, this lip paint goes from zero to 100 with one stroke of its lip-defining precision wand. Its serious 12-hour hold is so weightless you’d forget you’re wearing it if not for the non-stop compliments. And if that’s not enough, Stunna Lip Paint won’t feather, staying kissably smooth all day. In other words: it behaves so you don’t have to.

What else you need to know:

  • Fenty Beauty is 100% cruelty-free.
attributes.how-to-text: Stunna Lip Paint’s hyper-intense pigment performs best when activated, so shake before use!
attributes.ingredients: Isododecane, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Propylene Carbonate, Red 7 (Ci 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985).

seo.meta-description: Buy Fenty Beauty Stunna Lip Paint here. Discover the weightless, 12-hour long-lasting liquid lipstick in a high-impact colour with a soft matte finish.
